After The Criminals, The Criminals 2-Homicides, The Criminals 3-Arson, now comes Assault the fourth in a series of hugely successful true crime anthology films. Exploitation expert Kuei Chih hung (Spirit Of The Raped) helms Maniac, about a serial abductor/rapist/killer.
 Masterful martial arts movie maker Sun Chung (The Avenging Eagle) directs Queen Of Temple Street, the effecting story of an ethereal beauty sold into slavery by her gambling-obsessed, drug addicted husband.
 True crime aficionados from around the world have praised this beautifully made installment, which expertly combines the potent with the poetic.

Part 1 : 'Maniac' - A gang is kidnapping and raping young women. Part 2: 'Queen of Temple Street' - A gambling addict sells his wife to a brothel to pay off his debts.
